com.kontakt.sdk.ble.manager

Class BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.ble.manager.BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BeaconManager.Configuration

    public static final class BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder
extends Object
    Configuration builder is responsible for creating immutable configuration which acts as a parameters and callbacks supplier and thus describes desired behaviour.

    By default the Builder is initialized with all default parameters which do not enable any of the functionality.

        public Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • registerMonitoringListener

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder registerMonitoringListener(BeaconManager.MonitoringListener monitoringListener)
        Sets monitoring listener BeaconManager.MonitoringListener. The listener is responsible for notifying about monitored beacons.

        If not set, the MonitoringListener.NULL_MONITORING_LISTENER is applied to the configuration which does not inform about anything.

        Parameters:
        monitoringListener - - the monitoring listener
        Returns:
        the builder instance

      • setRssiCalculator

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder setRssiCalculator(RssiCalculator rssiCalculator)

      • registerRangingListener

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder registerRangingListener(BeaconManager.RangingListener rangingListener)
        Sets ranging listener BeaconManager.RangingListener. The listener is responsible for notifying about ranged beacons.

        If not set, the RangingListener.NULL_RANGING_LISTENER is applied to the configuration which does not inform about anything.

        Parameters:
        rangingListener - - the ranging listener
        Returns:
        the builder instance

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • setScanMode

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder setScanMode(int scanMode)
        Sets scan mode. Please note that Scan Mode selection is available in Android L. For versions lower than Android L this parameter does not affect scan performance.
        Parameters:
        scanMode - the scan mode
        Returns:
        the builder instance

      • setDistanceSort

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder setDistanceSort(BeaconDevice.DistanceSort distanceSort)
        Sets distance sort (BeaconDevice.DistanceSort).

        DistanceSort.ASC or DistanceSort.DESC should be applied when sorting beacons by distance is desired.

        If not set, the DistanceSort.DISABLED parameter is applied which does not enable beacons sorting by distance.

        Parameters:
        distanceSort - the distance sort
        Returns:
        the builder instance

      • setBeaconActivityCheckConfiguration

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder setBeaconActivityCheckConfiguration(BeaconActivityCheckConfiguration beaconActivityCheckConfiguration)
        Sets BeaconActivityCheckConfiguration (BeaconActivityCheckConfiguration).

        By default, the configuration is disabled and beacons which signal's strength becomes unidentifiable remain in internal cache. Filtering active beacons list by applying removal configuration gives more reliable relation to real beacons surrounding in particular moment.

        This parameter should be applied if desired before invoking startMonitoring/startRanging methods.

        If not set, this functionality is disabled.

        Parameters:
        beaconActivityCheckConfiguration - the removal configuration
        Returns:
        the builder instance

      • setForceScanConfiguration

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder setForceScanConfiguration(ForceScanConfiguration forceScanConfiguration)
        Sets ForceScanConfiguration (ForceScanConfiguration).
        Parameters:
        forceScanConfiguration - the force scan configuration
        Returns:
        the builder instance

      • setMonitorPeriod

        public BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder setMonitorPeriod(MonitorPeriod monitorPeriod)

        Parameters:
        monitorPeriod - the monitor period
        Returns:
        the builder instance

      • build

        public BeaconManager.Configuration build()
        Builds immutable configuration instance.
        Returns:
        new immutable configuration instance
